show_name: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Yumemiru Shoujo no Yume wo Minai
other_title: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl
青春ブタ野郎はゆめみる少女の夢を見ない
ending_theme: "Fukashigi no Carte movie ver. (不可思議のカルテ movie ver.)" by Mai Sakurajima (Asami Seto), Tomoe Koga (Nao Touyama), Rio Futaba (Atsumi Tanezaki), Nodoka Toyohama (Maaya Uchida), Kaede Azusawara (Yurika Kubo), Shouko Makinohara (Inori Minase)
